short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Gemini AI answers next to Google search results!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet AI in Google Search, the cool new way to search. It's like having a super smart helper right alongside Google! This amazing tool gives you quick Gemini AI summaries next to your Google results, making it easy to find what you need.

Key Features:

✔️ Smart Search Boost: Find what you're looking for faster with smart summaries right next to your regular results.

✔️ Quick Answers: Ask Gemini anything and get simple, smart answers based on lots of internet searches.

✔️ Works Everywhere: Use it with Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo, and more – it's like having your own search genie!

✔️ Dark Mode Friendly: Switch to dark mode in your browser for a comfy search experience, day or night.

Customize Your Search:

🔍 Connect with your Google account to make searching even easier.

🔍 Control when Gemini helps you so you're always in charge.

Exclusive Extras:

✨ Chat with Gemini while you search – it's like having a buddy who knows everything!

✨ Save chats for later on the Gemini website so you never forget a thing.

Get ready for a whole new way to search with Gemini AI for Google – it's super easy and super smart! 🌟
